transcript:
Customer: Hello?

Executive: Hello?

Customer: Hello?

Executive: Haan ji Naved ji.

Customer: Haan ji kaun?

Executive: Naved ji good morning main Pallavi baat kar rahi hoon India Mart se.

Customer: Haan ji bataiye.

Executive: Okay sir sir aapne ek refund ka request dala hua tha.

Customer: Haan ji.

Executive: Hai na main aage team mein bhi wo request dal di thi to abhi tak to unka jawab na hi aa raha tha ki refund nahi hoga nahi hoga theek hai.

Customer: Ji ji.

Executive: But jaise bhi abhi upar se ha yes aa gaya hai refund ke liye.

Customer: Ji ji thank you.

Executive: To aapka services hum band kar de.

Customer: Theek hai thank you.

Executive: Service aapka band ho jayega and approximately aapka 19000 bacha hua hai India mart par.

Customer: Ji.

Executive: 19640 ke aas pass hai.

Customer: Ji ji ji ji.

Executive: Process mein jayega amount aur che se saat din ke andar aapke account mein reflect kar jayega.

Customer: Okay mam thank you.

Executive: Theek hai na to account hai na accounts ka process thoda sa lamba rehta hai theek hai to.

Customer: Koi baat nahi hai.

Executive: Theek hai sir aapne ek credit card se payment kiya tha aur ek UPI se kiya tha na.

Customer: Haan UPI se kiya tha.

Executive: Ek UPI se 10000 kiya tha isi number pe ho jaye aap isi number pe UPI karwa de.

Executive: Nahi nahi nahi nahi sir dekhiye jis sadhan se aap payment karte hain na usi sadhan mein payment jata hai wapas to jaise aapne 23000 credit card se kiya tha.

Customer: Haan.

Executive: To ho sakta hai ki credit card mein jaye kuch paisa aur kuch paisa jis UPI se kiya tha usme jayega.

Customer: Haan to koi nahi aap chaho to credit card mein pura dal do mujhe koi dikkat nahi hai.

Executive: Hai na ha na to jaisa bhi rahega ek bar main aapko agle hafte confirm kar dungi ki aapka paisa kis mein gaya hua hai theek hai to aap ek hafte ka intzar kar lijiye main aapko whatsapp pe hi bhej deti hu agar aapko kuch doubt rahega to aap mujhse whatsapp pe coordinate kariyega to main account se puch ke account se confirmation leke aapko bata dungi theek hai sir.

Customer: Theek hai mam thank you.

Executive: And jo aapne complaint dala hua tha ye main ab aage complaint close kar de rahi hu theek hai sir.

Customer: Theek hai mam okay.

Executive: Theek hai 19 amount aap likh lijiye 19643.

Customer: Haan theek hai sara baat aaj tak aapne jitni baat mujhse ki hai sara on record hai.

Executive: Theek hai theek hai chaliye theek hai sir aapka complaint close kar rahi hu whatsapp par main hi kar rahi hu taki aapko kuch bhi status janna ho refund ka to aap mujhe whatsapp pe confirm kar sakte hain theek hai.

Customer: Okay mam okay okay sir thank you.

Executive: Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer requested a refund.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed refund approval.

- Executive informed service will be closed.

- Executive mentioned refund amount is ₹19,640.

- Executive explained refund process and timeline.

- Executive clarified refund will be processed via original payment methods.

- Executive offered to provide updates via WhatsApp.

- Executive confirmed complaint closure.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will confirm refund details next week.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, payment method, complaint closure
